hero.strong: Hi! I'm Sebastian, a developer with over 2 years of experience in the IT field.
hero.description: My approach goes beyond writing code; it's about turning ideas into fast and effective applications, where every detail is designed to create unique digital experiences, so users enjoy the experience from the very first click.

freelance.title: Freelance Developer
content: I develop landing pages that reflect the brand identity of each business.
I build customized online stores (e-commerce) tailored to specific needs.
I design and develop scalable web applications optimized for performance and accessibility.
I create digital solutions adapted to different business needs, enhancing online presence and user experience.

gravitad.title: Dazlabs - Frontend Developer
content: I develop user interfaces using React.js, ensuring performance and scalability.
I build functional and responsive web applications.
I work closely with the UX/UI team to accurately translate designs into interfaces.
I collaborate with the backend team to integrate features and ensure smooth communication between services.
We follow the Scrum methodology to organize tasks, encourage collaboration, and meet deadlines.

contact-form.title: Every great project starts with a plan.
contact-form.description: Send me a message, and I will get back to you shortly to explore how we can collaborate together.
contact-form.subtitle: Contact me!
